root

Class UserManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • root.UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages all the users and monsters in the database, such as adding and getting users by name or id. It can also communicates with the database to update both user listings.
    Author:
    Csoma Silhab
